entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:14 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -12.1°C
Wind: SW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this morning. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Amount 4 cm in snow squalls. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie this evening. Amount 4 cm in snow squalls. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
